verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, You are more precious than silver. Lord, You are more costly than gold. Lord, You are more beautiful than diamonds. And nothing I desire compares with You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, Your love extends to the heavens. Lord, Your love is deeper than the sea. Lord, Your love encompasses the nations. Thereâ€™s nothing more I want instead of Thee.{/lang-eng}
